components.planningdetails

Class DefaultState

  • java.lang.Object
    • components.planningdetails.PlanningDetailsState
      • components.planningdetails.DefaultState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPlanningDetailsState

    public class DefaultState
extends PlanningDetailsState
    This is the default state of the PlanningDetails component. Its main purpose is to display the planning: the ordered way points with the time of the various events involved.

    • Method Detail

      • onAddWaypointAction

        @NotNull
public IPlanningDetailsState onAddWaypointAction(@NotNull
                                                          AddWaypointAction action)
        Changes the state of the component to "selecting an intersection". It is triggered when the user clicks on the "add" button between two existing waypoints.
        Specified by:
        onAddWaypointAction in interface IPlanningDetailsState
        Overrides:
        onAddWaypointAction in class PlanningDetailsState
        Parameters:
        action - The object represent the action of the user. Mainly contains the index where to add the new waypoint.
        Returns:
        The SelectingWaypointsState to use as the new state of the planning component.
